Summary: It was a live news broadcast, when a very fast moving disk flew in view of the news camera
divs: Sighting DetailsIt was storming and lightening out side when i was watching the latest news update on the Casey Anthony case, the reporter was in Kissimmee in front of the lawyers office. I was waching the sky behind the reporter when something zipped by, now the broadcast was live and when the object came into view, the camera man was taken off air almost instantly , I taped it and by now i have watched it in slow motion over 50 times and what I have without adout is a lowflying disk caught by our local news crew in the daylight, it is so close you can even see how it disturbs the air around it as it moves across the sky. It is jaw dropping,but what do I do, who do I tell?
